fixes.name: Price Type
fixes.dax_expression: SWITCH(SELECTEDVALUE('Price Type'[Display As]), "Open", 'stock_data+'[Price Open], "Close", 'stock_data+'[Price Close], "High", 'stock_data+'[Price High], BLANK())
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau CASE on the parameter with DAX SWITCH using SELECTEDVALUE('Price Type'[Display As]) for the parameter. Mapped row fields to 'stock_data+'[Price Open], 'stock_data+'[Price Close], and 'stock_data+'[Price High]. No ELSE in Tableau becomes BLANK() in DAX.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter ([Parameters].[Price Type]); parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
